column5: Stopped by a Canadian Tire in Hamilton and picked up a few lures.  From what I've seen most CT's, not all, have this deal going on.  The following were on sale:  Wally Divers are $3.48 Grappling Shads $2.83 Rippling Redfins $3.44 Jitterbugs\Hula Poppers\Torpedos $3.53 CC Suspending Spot $1.83 Might be a few more, depending on which CT you go to.  At least the CT I went to, there still was a fair selection to pick from.  So if you are looking for the lures I mentioned, you maybe in luck, sale ends tomorrow (Friday).  Happy shopping.

I've been at the CTC in Brantford and they had totally different deals than the CTC in Kitchener. In Kitchener they have Gulp grubs (chartruese,white) on for $1.69. What a great deal ! They had the "Bob Izumi signature series" Walleye divers (and others) on sale in Brantford but I missed out so when I was in Kitchener I checked and they weren't on sale there? Different stores must have gotten different clearout merchandise. Wish they'd get some half priced Abu baitcaster reels LOL.
Oh sure I go and drop a wad at BPS yesterday on similar baits and NOW you tell me about this  .  Hehe guess I can always use some more (I'm so weak), thanks for the note!
There's also soft baits and couple spools of line. Nothing special jsut a little basket. Not worth driving if you don't live in the Hammer.
Nothing for sale here in Orangeville.  BTW GO ISLANDERS GO!
LOL I need a Leafs loss and a Habs win tonite and it will be a wonderful weekend.
Dang! I think i have everything i need for this season but i guess it wont hurt to swing in and take a look   .
